In England, in the seven days to 29 October, there were 234,937 new confirmed cases (415.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 October, there were 274,280 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (39,343 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 November is 7,794,507 (13,783.4 cases per 100,000 population).
